name: Blood Glucose Machine
description:
Background:
Madam S is a resilient single mother who is currently managing multiple chronic conditions — hypertension, Type II diabetes, and chronic kidney disease (CKD) requiring dialysis three times a week. Despite her health challenges, she continues to support her children, ensuring their daily needs are met and that they remain under stable care.

Current Situation:
Madam S works 2 to 4 days a week, on alternating day (9 a.m. – 9 p.m.) and night (9 p.m. – 9 a.m.) shifts, to provide for her family. Her irregular working hours and ongoing dialysis treatments significantly limit her income and physical stamina. She has no regular partner support and relies mainly on her own effort, with occasional help from friends and relatives who assist in caring for her children during her dialysis sessions and work shifts.

Need:
A blood glucose monitoring machine would greatly support Madam S in managing her diabetes more effectively between dialysis sessions. Currently, she does not have a reliable way to monitor her blood sugar levels at home, which puts her at higher risk for hypoglycemic or hyperglycemic episodes.

Intended Outcome:
With access to a blood glucose monitor and test strips, Madam S will be able to:
• Track her blood sugar levels regularly and adjust her diet or medication accordingly.
• Better manage her condition, reducing complications and hospital admissions.
• Maintain stability for her children through improved health and fewer medical disruptions.

Request:
We seek support to provide:
• One (1) blood glucose monitoring device
• Lancets and test strips (minimum 6 months’ supply)
• Alcohol wipes

Closing Statement:
Madam S exemplifies quiet strength and determination in the face of chronic illness and caregiving responsibilities. Your contribution will not only meet an immediate medical need but also affirm her effort to remain a caring and self-reliant mother despite the challenges she faces.

name: Glucose (Blood Sugar) Monitoring Device
description:

Please refer to this for reference: https://www.pharmacy.nhg.com.sg/cordx-dexitalk-blood-glucose-meter-test-strips-50s-lancets-50s

name: Request for Adult Diaper, Size M, Tape, High Absorbency
description:
I am writing to seek support for an elderly patient who has been diagnosed with dementia and currently wheelchair bound. She lives with her son, who is battling late‑stage cancer. While the family is doing their best to provide care, the heavy medical requirements have placed them under significant financial strain.

To ease the burden, we would like to request assistance with adult diapers for the elderly patient. This will greatly help the family in managing daily caregiving needs and maintaining the patient’s comfort and dignity.

Details of request:
Diaper size: Medium (M)
Preferred brand: Tena
Type: high-absorbency wrap-typed (tape)

Any donation of these diapers would be deeply appreciated and will go a long way in relieving the family’s caregiving stress during this difficult time.

Thank you very much for your kind consideration and support.

name: Request for Adult Diaper Assistance for Hospice Patient
description:
I am writing to seek help for a cancer patient currently under home hospice care. The patient is on medication which causes frequent and uncontrollable diarrhea, making adult diapers essential for daily comfort and hygiene.

As the caregiving family is already facing high medical costs, the added expense of incontinence supplies has become very stressful. We hope to request support to ease the burden and allow the caregiver to focus on providing quality care.

Details of request:
Diaper size: Large (L)
Type: Wrapped or pull‑up (both acceptable)

We would be very grateful if your organization could assist with providing these diapers. Your kind support will go a long way in helping the patient maintain dignity and reducing the strain on the caregiver.

Thank you very much for your consideration.
